data.text: @ABC7NY But yet they want to raise the fair . Watch and see that extra set of books.  MOB RUN MTA..
@ABC7NY Another funding to the transit? The last funding is about 500m and all was done is paint and sweeping floor plus more crime?
@ABC7NY Win back riders? Or force private companies to overlook the safety and welfare of their employees for the sake of revenue?

@ABC7NY Lol!! NYC MTA will need billions of dollars to be modernized and a competent management. NYC has probably the only subway system in the world where you can enjoy the view of obese rats eating pizza and hot dogs before you hop on a car. The show will cost you 2.75 though.
@ABC7NY They will spend it in 10 min
@ABC7NY they're going to do nothing to improve service

@ABC7NY There is no greater joy than having financial stability and a life free of debts, thatâ€™s why I keep tweeting about @JulieCrypto_ it has been a pleasure collaborating with you...there is no other way I can show my appreciation other than tweeting the good deed you have done.
